thread.title: Oman- Sultanate marks World Tourism Day
thread.title_full: Oman- Sultanate marks World Tourism Day | MENAFN.COM

author: Muscat Daily
title: Oman- Sultanate marks World Tourism Day
text:
(MENAFN - Muscat Daily) Oman along with the rest of the world  marked the World Tourism Day on Sunday. Muscat Daily This year's theme is 'One Billion Tourists One Billion Opportunities'.
Oman has experienced a boom in tourism with statistics indicating that over 2bn tourists visited the sultanate last year. The annual growth during the past ten years (2005-2014) stood at 7.4 per cent.
H E Ahmed bin Nasser bin Hamad al Mehrzi Minister of Tourism said that the industry has witnessed a rapid growth and is one of the main pillars for economic and social development in the country.
He pointed out that the Ministry of Tourism (MoT) has a series of plans and promotional campaigns to promote the sultanate as one of the world's unique tourism destinations.
H E Maitha al Mahrouqi Undersecretary in MoT said that the theme of this year's celebration stresses the importance of the tourism sector in economic and social development.
